title: Ten killed more than a million displaced by powerful Chile earthquake
content: Strong aftershocks rippled through Chile on Thursday after a magnitude 8.3 earthquake that killed at least 10 people and slammed powerful waves into coastal towns, forcing more than a million people from their homes.The government ordered evacuations from coastal areas after the powerful quake hit on Wednesday evening, seeking to avoid a repeat of a quake disaster in 2010 when authorities were slow to warn of a tsunami that killed hundreds.Related
